Name: Landmarks, Heckscher Building, Manhattan (N 240374 HIM)
Title: Application number N 240374 HIM, for the proposed designation by the Landmarks Preservation Commission of the Heckscher Building (now the Crown Building), located at 730 Fifth Avenue (Block 1272, Lot 7503), as an historic landmark (DL-539/LP-2678), submitted pursuant to Section 3020 of the New York City Charter and Section 25-303 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, Borough of Manhattan, Community District 5, Council District 4.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
